attributes.action: Ringfenced money for Children with Special educational needs
attributes.additional_details:
We want:

Any Money allocated to a child with special educational needs which is below the threshold for the new educational health-care Plan, to be ring-fenced for that specific child. We want the school to have to justify that they have spent it on that specific child.


We want schools to asses for special educational needs to the government standard, not the a specific school standard.


We want there to be a way for parents to apply for this, and a fully accountable and clear appeals process.
